title: ViVii – And Tragic
body:
Stockholm trio ViVii are one of my favourite new acts of the past year, and they’re up against some serious competition.

Their brand of wistful, dreamy pop is completely intoxicating and addictive; simultaneously romantic and haunting, bringing about comparisons to early Beach House. Check out their recent single, And Tragic, below, released via Dumont Dumont.

Check out their recent single, And Tragic, below, released via Dumont Dumont.
